metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart and the player talk after escaping the Nautiloid and  arriving on a beach in the middle of nowhere. The player finds Shadowheart unconscious, and can wake her, attempt to loot her, or just leave her. The player can officially recruit SH, who'll be grateful for the player saving her previously. This dialogue only occurs if the player freed SH during the tutorial - otherwise she'll be found at the chapel door a short distance away.
metadata.how_to_trigger: -  Load TUT- Recon: SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Shadowheart_State_BeachRecruitment- Debug book: Go to region - 1.Crash site- Find Shadowheart knocked out on the beach at 273, 224- Click to talk to her OR Attempt to pickpocket the artifact

0.context: CinematicNodeContext:  Shadowheart is lying on the ground, unconscious. The githyanki artefact she retrieved from her nautiloid pod is beneath her hand.

11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches for Shadowhear and shakes her shoulder (no contact needs to be shown). She wakes suddenly and gets to her feet, putting the artefact away.

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *She almost looks like she's weighing up whether to continue hostilities... but decides against it.*

8.speaker: Shadowheart
8.text: Oh is  that what you're doing? And I suppose you were testing my reflexes when you thumped me over the head.
8.context: NodeContext: Note of suspicion (but she'll ultimately let it slide)

49.speaker: Shadowheart
49.text: I'm alive, yes. Thank you for the concern.
49.context: NodeContext: A little suspicious. Doesn't  quite believe the player, but will let it slide.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: I wanted to see if you'd anything worth taking.

81.speaker: Shadowheart
81.text: What, you didn't think to search me after you knocked me unconscious? I'll let it slide this time - as I owe you my life.
81.context: NodeContext: Flash of anger, leavened by the fact the player helped her escape her pod aboard the nautiloid.

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: Well that's honest of you. Don't do it again - I'll give you a pass this time, considering I owe you my life.

38.speaker: Shadowheart
38.text: And speaking of - how are we alive...?

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I was hoping you might know that.

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: No, not while I was out could. I remember a falling sensation - I thought I was dreaming. Next thing I know, I'm here.

25.speaker: Shadowheart
25.text: I remember the ship, I remember falling... then nothing.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: What happened to our gith friend?

18.speaker: Shadowheart
18.text: You might want to reconsider calling her a friend - looks like she ran off without us.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: We should look for her - she might be injured, or worse.
84.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN if SH became a follower aboard the nautiloid.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I should look for her - she might be injured, or worse.
51.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN if SH did NOT become a follower aboard the nautiloid.

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.text: You're more concerned for her than she is for you, clearly. We need to take care of ourselves.

19.speaker: Shadowheart
19.text: First things first - we need supplies, shelter, and most of all, a healer.

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.text: We might have escaped, but we still have these little monsters in our heads.
10.context: NodeContext: 'We're not out of the woods yet'

3.speaker: Player
3.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN if SH became a follower aboard the nautiloid.

36.speaker: Shadowheart
36.text: We need each other, and we both know what's at stake. I can't think of better company.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: No. This is where we part ways.

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: You sure about that? Neither of us knows what lies ahead.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: All right, fine. Let's stay together.
87.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN if SH became a follower aboard the nautiloid.

66.speaker: Shadowheart
66.text: Wait. Perhaps we shouldn't. You're not the one I need to talk to, are you? Not really.
66.context: NodeContext: realisation that she isn't talking to the person in charge.

90.speaker: Shadowheart
90.text: I can feel it, in your head. You follow someone else's orders. I'll deal with them, not you.

13.speaker: Shadowheart
13.text: I have to get moving. Perhaps our paths will cross again later.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Wait - after all that, you won't join me?

50.speaker: Shadowheart
50.text: I'll join along - if I can speak to whoever's really in charge. Otherwise, I'd best be on my way.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: You know, I think I'd rather take my chances without you.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Perhaps we'll meet again. If you survive, that is.

39.speaker: Shadowheart
39.text: You seem overburdened with hangers-on already.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: I'll mark my camp on your map. You can rest there.

83.speaker: Shadowheart
83.text: One thing, just before we go. I wanted to thank you again, for freeing me... even if you did knock me unconscious afterwards.
83.context: NodeContext: Grateful - with a hint of droll snark at the end (player knocked her out during tutorial)

57.speaker: Shadowheart
57.text: One thing, just before we go. I wanted to thank you again, for freeing me.

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: It would've been all too easy for you to run right past my pod, but you didn't. I'll remember that.
70.context: InternalNodeContext: Shadowheart's approval of the player increases by 5NodeContext: Genuine.

47.speaker: Player
47.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN if SH did NOT become a follower aboard the nautiloid.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: I'm sure. Best if you head on your way now.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: 'We'? You want to come with me?
72.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN if SH did NOT become a follower aboard the nautiloid.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Do you have any idea where we are?

9.speaker: Player
9.text: You want to stay together, I take it?
9.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN if SH became a follower aboard the nautiloid.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: You want to join me, I take it?
80.context: InternalNodeContext: This QN if SH did NOT become a follower aboard the nautiloid.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: What happened to our gith friend?

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Indeed, I'd better get moving then. Farewell.

7.speaker: Shadowheart
7.text: Wait - charging off by yourself sounds like a fine way to get killed.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Raised palm, bidding the player to wait a moment.NodeContext: 'Hold your horses.'

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Do you have any idea where we are?

61.speaker: Shadowheart
61.text: No... I don't recognise this place. But anything's an improvement on where we just came from.

79.speaker: Shadowheart
79.text: True. Seems like we're the lucky ones, judging by all the corpses strewn about.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Perhaps it was some dramatically timed divine intervention?

78.speaker: Shadowheart
78.text: The divine tend to keep their interventions close to the chest. Though I suppose it's not impossible.

12.speaker: Shadowheart
12.text: You... you knocked me out cold. I ought to return the favour - with interest.

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *She almost looks like she's weighing up whether to continue hostilities... until she notices the surrounds.*

75.speaker: Shadowheart
75.text: Wait. Where the hells are we? How are we alive?
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH Glances around.NodeContext: Breaks off angry accusartion of player as she notices the surrounds.

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: You're alive. I'm alive. How is this possible...?

86.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches to take the artefact, only for Shadowheart to wake with a start. She gets to her feet, putting the artefact away.

14.speaker: Player
14.context: InternalNodeContext: SH will remain here until the player nears the grove, in which case she's move to her grove recruitment position

26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart is lying on the ground, unconscious,  face up. The player leans in to pickpocket her. Shadowheart wakes with a start.InternalNodeContext: This flow occurs if the player attempts to loot her via gameplay/UI
